spec_data.Name: perl-Devel-Confess
spec_data.Description:
This module is meant as a debugging aid. It can be used to make a script
complain loudly with stack backtraces when warn()ing or die()ing. Unlike
other similar modules (e.g. Carp::Always), stack traces will also be
included when exception objects are thrown.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:43:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Include stack traces on all warnings and errors
